summary: A young boy in a nameless, timeless American town establishes a gang of youthful misfits united in their love of guns and their code of honor.
cast: Jamie Bell|Bill Pullman|Michael Angarano|Danso Gordon|Novella Nelson|Chris Owen|Alison Pill|Mark Webber|Trevor Cooper|Matthew Géczy|William Hootkins|Teddy Kempner|Thomas Bo Larsen
title: Querida Wendy
